title: Exclusive: B2B Marketing Analytics Startup Dreamdata Lands $55M Series B
summary: Dreamdata, a B2B marketing analytics platform, has raised $55 million in a Series B funding round led by PeakSpan Capital, with participation from InReach Ventures, Angel Invest, Curiosity Venture Capital, and Crowberry Capital. This latest round brings the total funding raised by the company to $67 million since its inception in 2018. Dreamdata aims to enhance B2B marketing by providing comprehensive buyer journey mapping and operational infrastructure for marketers.
